name: Derek Klivian: Master Pilot Online Quiz | Star Wars Books | 10 Questions

questions.text: What planet does Derek hail from?
questions.explanation:
Ralltiir.

	Raltiir is a technologically-advanced planet that is famous for its banking industry. It is also known for its medical centers. How convenient that a pilot who has escaped death so many times hails from a medically-renowned world!

questions.text: Which life-saving system did Derek endorse?
questions.explanation:
Bulior Repulsor Systems.

	Bulior Repulsor Systems marketed a kind of invisible shell that protected the pilot in the event of a starfighter crash. Derek was an unlucky pilot, so his endorsement was a wonderful public relations booster!

questions.text: Where did Derek go for his tenure in Imperial Academy?
questions.explanation:
Carida.

	Derek was eager to get into a TIE Fighter after studying at the Imperial Academy alongside Tycho Celchu, another skilled pilot. Carida is a planet with many varied terrains, making it the perfect training ground.

questions.text: Which ship was Derek assigned to after graduation?
questions.explanation:
The "Rand Ecliptic".

	Derek was under the command of Biggs Darklighter, a man who had similar doubts about the Empire. However, the two were not friends, although they would later both defect to the Rebel Alliance.

questions.text: Derek lost most of his left arm in a mutiny.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Derek led a mutiny onboard the ship, but lost his arm from below the mid-upper arm. The sight of the stump disgusted many people. Eventually, Derek got a prosthetic arm, allowing him to fly a starfighter again.

False.

	Rogue Squadron was created by Luke Skywalker and Wedge Antilles. Derek was one of the first pilots chosen to be a part of this elite team. Their first mission was to steal a host of X-Wings from an Imperial storage space, a mission that succeeded despite some rough spots.

questions.text: Which starfighter took off Derek's right leg?
questions.explanation:
A TIE Fighter.

	Derek and Biggs were stealing some X-Wings, planning on ejecting from their TIE-Fighters and having their droids take over. However, a passing TIE-Fighter clipped Derek and sheared his leg off. The suit's abilities sealed off the wound almost immediately.

questions.text: Where was Derek during the battle to destroy the first Death Star?
questions.correct: He was bed-ridden with an infection
questions.explanation:
He was bed-ridden with an infection.

	A strange jungle-borne infection affected Klivian's leg wound, and confined him to bed. A flower discovered by the late Biggs Darklighter helped Derek beat the infection.

questions.text: Derek was Luke Skywalker's wingman during the battle of Hoth.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Derek famously questioned the Alliance's tactics at Hoth. Both he and Luke flew snowspeeders against AT-AT walkers on the icy planet. Derek would later be present at Luke's wedding to Mara Jade.

Iella Wessiri.

	When they first met on Corellia, Klivian was bitten by a native insect. Due to this, Iella jokingly called Derek "Bugbite".
